project.name: Music in the Air
project.goal: The intention was it to create a game similiar to Guitar Hero but without the use of any game controls. Instead a Microsoft Kinect was used to receive gesture-based input.
project.summary: A game to teach you who to play instruments without owning one
project.functionality: The user can choose between playing guitar, piano or drums. If he is not sure about his abilities or never had played any instrument he can start of with a tutorial to each instrument which explains how to play the instrument and to stay on beat.
project.process:
Sketching

The different application states and screen were sketched and the gruop decided which instruments should be playable with regard to the hardware restrictions.

Implementation

  • C#
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
